metadata.name: What do you think of this project? #1/10
metadata.description:
One Question Project

Purchasing this NFT unlocks one hour of consulting time from Hydrate Labs to answer the following question: "What do you think of this project?"

I will spend 30 minutes reviewing your selected project beforehand. Don't provide any links, just the Twitter account of the project. I will do the rest. If you prefer, you can use some/all of the first 30 minutes to present the project to me on the call before we discuss it. No links.

To redeem:

-Read the Medium article in full (External URL linked to this NFT)  
-Connect your Twitter account to the NFT platform  
-Purchase the NFT  
-Follow @CryptoHydrate on Twitter  
-I will reach out to you via Twitter in a timely manner to arrange a Google Meets or Zoom call. I will provide the link to the call once we agree on a time. 

If you cannot reach me, email me at cryptohydate@gmail.com

Disclaimer:

I am not a financial advisor. 

My advice should not be taken as financial advice. 

These sessions are for entertainment purposes only.

No refunds.
